homePage.title: Your Favourite Food Delivered Hot & Fresh
homePage.text: HEALTHY SWITCHER chefs do all the prep work, like peeling, chopping & marinating, so you can cook a fresh homemade dinner in just 15 minutes.

mainCard.title: OUR STORY
mainCard.subtitle: discover
mainCard.text: In a Renaissance garden steps away from Plaza España, a 24-hour address for foodies that includes a restaurant, organic juice bar, tea room, cocktail bar and organic market. Enjoy on the table or take home products that are purely 100% natural, organic and sustainable.
mainCard.text2: Inspired by London markets such as the 'Queens Road Farmers' in London, organic and sustainable, our bio market hosts products coming directly from farms
